name: Worlds Without End
description: Spawned in the realm between the worlds, a Horror comes. Defeated in battle centuries before by the elven mage Aina, it walks again, seeking vengeance on the mortal lands. If Aina fails to convince the courts of Tir na nOg and Tir Tairngire of the danger, she will have to face the Horror alone once more--or watch the world end. NOTE: This story was originally written to conclude the Immortals trilogy; of which the first two parts were Earthdawn novels still unpublished at the time. Scars was published in 2005, and Little Treasures remains unpublished in English.
